SELECT EMP.CODE EMPLOYEE_CODE,EMP.NAME EMPLOYEE_NAME,DEPT.NAME DEPT_NAME,JOB.NAME JOB_NAME, DA.DATE_FROM,DA.DATE_TO,DAYS.DAYS DAYS,HOURS.HOURS HOURS FROM T_DAY_SIGN TDS LEFT JOIN (SELECT TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID,MIN(TDS.DATE_FROM) DATE_FROM,MAX(TDS.DATE_TO) DATE_TO FROM T_DAY_SIGN TDS WHERE TDS.DELETED = 0 AND TDS.STATE = 1 AND TDS.DATE_FROM >= TO_DATE('${para.dateStart}', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND TDS.DATE_TO <= TO_DATE('${para.dateEnd}', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') GROUP BY TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID) DA ON DA.EMPLOYEE_ID = TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID) DAYS,TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID FROM T_DAY_SIGN TDS WHERE TDS.DELETED=0 AND TDS.state =1 AND TDS.DATE_FROM >= TO_DATE('${para.dateStart}', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND TDS.DATE_TO <= TO_DATE('${para.dateEnd}', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') GROUP BY TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID) DAYS ON DAYS.EMPLOYEE_ID = TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(TDS.HOURS) HOURS,TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID FROM T_DAY_SIGN TDS WHERE TDS.DELETED=0 AND TDS.state =1 AND TDS.DATE_FROM >= TO_DATE('${para.dateStart}', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND TDS.DATE_TO <= TO_DATE('${para.dateEnd}', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') GROUP BY TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID) HOURS ON HOURS.EMPLOYEE_ID = TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN T_EMPLOYEE EMP ON EMP.ID= TDS.EMPLOYEE_ID AND EMP.JOB_STATE != 3 LEFT JOIN T_DEPT DEPT ON DEPT.ID = EMP.DEPT_ID AND DEPT.STATE = 1 LEFT JOIN T_JOB JOB ON JOB.ID = EMP.JOB_ID AND JOB.STATE = 1
GROUP BY EMP.CODE,EMP.NAME,DEPT.NAME,JOB.NAME,DA.DATE_FROM,DA.DATE_TO,DAYS.DAYS,HOURS.HOURS
ORDER BY EMP.NAME DESC
ORDER BY EMP.NAME ASC
ORDER BY EMP.CODE DESC
ORDER BY EMP.CODE ASC
ORDER BY DEPT.NAME DESC
ORDER BY DEPT.NAME ASC
ORDER BY JOB.NAME DESC

ORDER BY DA.DATE_FROM DESC
ORDER BY DA.DATE_FROM ASC
ORDER BY DA.DATE_TO DESC
ORDER BY DA.DATE_TO ASC

ORDER BY HOURS.HOURS DESC
